ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Snake-Eyes: The Origin: The origins of Snake-Eyes and Storm Shadow begin, and it's explained how they tie into each other. In the Everglades, the hunters become the hunted as Junkyard starts leading the Cobras right to the Joes, but actually leads them into quicksand. To be continued...
ComicInfo.Title: Snake-Eyes: The Origin
